lang.description: If set to auto, the plugin will use the player's locale; if set to silent, the plugin won't output any messages; if set to custom the plugin will use the language specified in the custom language file; If set to a locale, the plugin will use that locale.

jukebox-behaviour.description: If set to vanilla, the plugin will use the vanilla jukebox behaviour; if set to gui, the plugin will use the custom GUI.

jukebox-gui-style.description: Determines the style of the jukebox GUI.

jukebox-gui-size.description: Sets the maximum amount of items that can be added to a jukebox GUI.

disable-music-overlap.description: If set to true, the plugin will not play music if there is already music playing.

disc-loottables-limit.description: Sets the maximum amount of discs that can be found in chests, the default amount is 2.

chests/ancient_city.description: The maximum amount of discs that can be found in an Ancient City chest.

chests/underwater_ruin_small.description: The maximum amount of discs that can be found in an Underwater Ruin Small chest.

check-for-updates.description: If set to true, the plugin will check for updates on startup.

allow-metrics.description: If set to true, the plugin will send metrics to bStats. Please consider enabling this, as it helps me improve the plugin.

force-resource-pack.description: If set to true, the plugin will force players to use the resource pack. If the player declines, they will be kicked.

enable-resource-pack-host.description: If set to true, the plugin will host the resource pack and automatically send it to players.

resource-pack-host-custom-url.description: Custom resource pack download url that send to player

web-interface-port.description: The port the web interface api & resource pack will be hosted on.

web-interface-api-enabled.description: If set to true, the plugin will have a REST api running to edit the discs settings and the config.

web-interface-password.description: The password required to access the web interface api.
